Subject:

A copy of DGCA permit No. 396-AA/2013, issued under reference
No. 8/33/2009-IR dated 27.06.2013 regarding authorization to Department of
Home, Govt. of Chhattisgarh for carry or cause to carry the arms, ammunition and
explosives  from time to time in Bell 412 helicopter hired by Govt. of Chhattisgarh
for transportation of troops in connection with anti-naxalite operations in
Chhattisgarh is forwarded herewith for information and necessary action by all
concerned.
2.
This permit is valid upto 31.05.2014.
(Raja Srivastava, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
Enclosures : As above
Distribution - As per list attached.
Copy to :-
MCA (Shri U K Bhatia, U/Secretary), R G Bhawan, New Delhi.
